original_text: This is why I am against you, says the Lord Almighty. I will make you like a woman whose skirt is up over her face. I will show the countries that you are like that woman. You will be like a woman who is not wearing any clothes.
korean_text: 보라 내가 네게 말하노니 만군의 여호와의 말씀에 네 치마를 걷어 올려 네 얼굴에 이르게 하고 네 벌거벗은 것을 나라들에게 보이며 네 부끄러운 곳을 뭇 민족에게 보일 것이요

sentences.original_text: This is why I am against you
I will make you like a woman
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너를 한 여자처럼 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: whose skirt is up over her face
sentences.korean_translation: 그 치마가 얼굴 위로 올라간 여자처럼

sentences.original_text: that you are like that woman
You will be like a woman
who is not wearing any clothes
